text: Tragic Love is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithTragic LoveRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Arthur V. Johnson, David Miles, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as Bob Spaulding * David Miles as Mr. Rankin * Linda Arvidson as Mrs. Rankin * Charles Avery as In Factory * Clara T. Bracy * John R. Cumpson as Bartender * George Gebhardt as First Thief / In Factory * Robert Harron as Paper Boy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Tragic Love
